title: Line in is clipping
steps: Lower the input knob until it is no longer clipping.
If applicable, add a pad to the input channels.
Lower the the output gain of the channel from the mixer.

title: Focusirte not detected
steps: Power cycle the Focusrite by unplugging it and plugging it back in.
Fully close and restart the application.

title: Not able to hear playback from headphone line
steps: Ensure that direct monitoring is enabled (Button at the front illuminated green).
